doc.field: Record Group 12. History of the Ethical Culture Schools (1902-2015; 4 linear feet)
Record Group 12. History of the Ethical Culture Schools (1902-2015; 4 linear feet)

This series contains materials related to internal efforts to arrange, describe, and preserve the Ethical Culture Fieldston School's institutional archives. Types of materials include correspondence, meeting records, planning materials, inventories, and finding aids.
Additional materials related to the archival efforts of Director of Alumni Relations Toby Himmel can be found in Record Group 8, Alumni and alumni relations.
